verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, unto all Israel הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti Behold I have hearkened בְקֹֽלְכֶ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> ve-ko-le-Chem, unto your voice לְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- you אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> 'a-mar-Tem in all that ye said לִ֑י Li; וָאַמְלִ֥יךְ <S%H4427><s%> va-'am-Lich unto me and have made עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech. a king

וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh here הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ׀ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And now behold the king מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> mit-hal-Lech walketh לִפְנֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem, before וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I am זָקַ֣נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> za-Kan-ti you and I am old וָשַׂ֔בְתִּי <S%H7867><s%> va-Sav-ti, and grayheaded וּבָנַ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nai and behold my sons הִנָּ֣ם <S%H2009><s%> hin-Nam and behold אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; for וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> hit-hal-Lach-ti [are] with you and I have walked לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem, before מִנְּעֻרַ֖י <S%H5271><s%> min-ne-'u-Rai you from my childhood עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- even הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold עֲנ֣וּ <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Nu Behold here I [am] witness בִי֩ vi נֶ֨גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged before יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh against me before the LORD וְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> ve-Ne-ged before מְשִׁיח֗וֹ <S%H4899><s%> me-shi-Cho, and before his anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שׁוֹר֩׀ <S%H7794><s%> shOr whose ox מִ֨י <S%H4310><s%> mi Whose לָקַ֜חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ti have I taken וַחֲמ֧וֹר <S%H2543><s%> va-cha-Mor ;or whose ass מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi whose לָקַ֗חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ti, have I taken וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi whom עָשַׁ֙קְתִּי֙ <S%H6231><s%> 'a-Shak-ti ;or whom have I defrauded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi whose רַצּ֔וֹתִי <S%H7533><s%> ratz-Tzo-ti, ;whom have I oppressed וּמִיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> u-mi-yad- ;or of whose hand מִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> mi Whose לָקַ֣חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ti taken כֹ֔פֶר <S%H3724><s%> Cho-fer, have I received [any] bribe וְאַעְלִ֥ים <S%H5956><s%> ve-'a'-Lim to blind עֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai mine eyes בּ֑וֹ bo; וְאָשִׁ֖יב <S%H7725><s%> ve-'a-Shiv therewith;and I will restore לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And they said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not עֲשַׁקְתָּ֖נוּ <S%H6231><s%> 'a-shak-Ta-nu Thou hast not defrauded וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or רַצּוֹתָ֑נוּ <S%H7533><s%> ratz-tzo-Ta-nu; us nor oppressed וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- or לָקַ֥חְתָּ <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ta us neither hast thou taken מִיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> mi-yad- hand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of any man's מְאֽוּמָה׃ <S%H3972><s%> me-'U-mah. ought

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem about עֵ֧ד <S%H5707><s%> 'ed [is] witness יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto them The LORD בָּכֶ֗ם ba-Chem, וְעֵ֤ד <S%H5707><s%> ve-'Ed [is] witness מְשִׁיחוֹ֙ <S%H4899><s%> me-shi-Cho against you and his anointed הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo not מְצָאתֶ֛ם <S%H4672><s%> me-tza-Tem that ye have not found בְּיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di in my hand מְא֑וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> me-'U-mah; ought וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And they answered עֵֽד׃ <S%H5707><s%> 'Ed. [He is] witness פ Peh

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; unto the people יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [It is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah that advanced אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron וַאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lah up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, now הִֽתְיַצְּב֛וּ <S%H3320><s%> hit-yatz-tze-Vu Now therefore stand still וְאִשָּׁפְטָ֥ה <S%H8199><s%> ve-'ish-sha-fe-Tah that I may reason אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem concerning לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei with you before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all צִדְק֣וֹת <S%H6666><s%> tzid-Kot of all the righteous acts יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah which he did אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem concerning וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et concerning אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem. to you and to your fathers

כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher- after בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ba was come יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko When Jacob מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; into Egypt וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <S%H2199><s%> vai-yiz-'a-Ku cried אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem and your fathers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh then the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron וַיּוֹצִ֤יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tzi-'u which brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וַיֹּשִׁב֖וּם <S%H3427><s%> vai-yo-shi-Vum and made them dwell בַּמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וַֽיִּשְׁכְּח֖וּ <S%H7911><s%> vai-yish-ke-Chu And when they forgat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God וַיִּמְכֹּ֣ר <S%H4376><s%> vai-yim-Kor he sold אֹתָ֡ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad them into the hand סִֽיסְרָא֩ <S%H5516><s%> si-se-Ra of Sisera שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- captain צְבָ֨א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va of the host חָצ֜וֹר <S%H2674><s%> cha-Tzor of Hazor וּבְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-yad- and into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וּבְיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-Yad and into the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech of the king מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu and they fought בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <S%H2199><s%> vai-yiz-'a-Ku And they cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD; וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru answer קחָטָ֔אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu, We have sinned כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki because עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Zav-nu because we have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וַנַּעֲבֹ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> van-na-'a-Vod and have served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H1168><s%> hab-be-'a-Lim Baalim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעַשְׁתָּר֑וֹת <S%H6252><s%> ha-'ash-ta-Rot; and Ashtaroth וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, now הַצִּילֵ֛נוּ <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-nu but now deliver מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad us out of the hand אֹיְבֵ֖ינוּ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-nu of our enemies וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> ve-na-'av-De-ka. and we will serve

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <S%H3378><s%> ye-rub-Ba-'al Jerubbaal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּדָ֔ן <S%H917><s%> be-Dan, and Bedan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יִפְתָּ֖ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach and Jephthah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El; and Samuel וַיַּצֵּ֨ל <S%H5337><s%> vai-yatz-Tzel and delivered אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִיַּ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad you out of the hand אֹֽיְבֵיכֶם֙ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-vei-Chem of your enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv, on every side וַתֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> vat-te-she-Vu and ye dwelled בֶּֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> Be-tach. safe

וַתִּרְא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> vat-tir-'U, And when ye saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that נָחָ֞שׁ <S%H5176><s%> na-Chash that Nahash מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children עַמּוֹן֮ <S%H5983><s%> 'am-mOn of Ammon בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba came עֲלֵיכֶם֒ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem against וַתֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-me-ru against you ye said לִ֔י Li, לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> lo No כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- but מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech unto me Nay but a king יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> yim-Loch shall reign עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; over וַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh over us when the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> mal-ke-Chem. [was] your king

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh here הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech Now therefore behold the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H977><s%> be-char-Tem whom ye have chosen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you שְׁאֶלְתֶּ֑ם <S%H7592><s%> she-'el-Tem; [and] whom ye have desired וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath set יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and behold the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech. a king
